card.data.ethereal_form.name: Ethereal Form
card.data.ethereal_form.actions.basic: Move4. The cost of all terrains (including Lakes) becomes 2 but you cannot enter Hills and Mountains
card.data.ethereal_form.actions.advanced: Your Followers gain <style="value">All</style> Resistances. You <style="status">ignore</style> the first <style="wound">Wound</style> taken this turn
